meanings.sent1: The apple looked wormier than the pear.
meanings.sent2: The soil in the garden seemed wormier after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The old book had a wormier cover than the new one.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as wormier as a garden full of earthworms.
meanings.sent5: The smell of decay made the room feel even wormier.

meanings.sent1: The sandwich tasted wormier than it looked.
meanings.sent2: The wood in the forest felt wormier in the dampness.
meanings.sent3: The fishing bait looked even wormier after being left in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stump was as wormier as a termite buffet.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the rain made the ground feel even wormier.

meanings.sent1: The smell in the basement was wormier than in the attic.
meanings.sent2: The fabric of the shirt felt wormier after being washed.
meanings.sent3: The garden hose looked even wormier after being left out in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The old log was as wormier as a feast for insects.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the apple made her mouth feel even wormier.
